text:
Together or not, Rob Kardashian has a lot of love for Blac Chyna! The 30-year-old reality star took to Instagram on Sunday to honor his baby mama on Mother’s Day.

After sharing a sweet post to his own mom, Kris Jenner, Kardashian posted a throwback video of Chyna to Instagram. The clip followed Chyna’s pregnancy and the birth of Kardashian’s daughter, Dream.



MORE: Blac Chyna Goes Glam for Friend's Wedding -- See the Chic Pics!





“And happy mama's day to the mother of my only child @blacchyna :) I am so Thankful for our beautiful baby girl and so Thankful for YOU and never thought I could be this Happy so thank you for giving me Her,” he captioned the footage.

The on-again, off-again pair appeared to spend the holiday apart. Rob visited his sisters earlier in the day where they all cuddled with baby Dream on Snapchat, posting several sweet clips.

Dream then reunited with her mom and brother, King Cairo, later in the day for some Mother’s Day shenanigans. Chyna documented her special day on Snapchat, posting photos and videos with her two children.

“Happy Mother’s Day, Dreamy,” she said in one clip, kissing her smiling daughter on the cheek.

She also shared a bouquet of roses and orchids, captioning it with a clover emoji – a symbol she often associates with Rob.

RELATED: Rob Kardashian Wishes Blac Chyna a Happy Birthday on Instagram After Skipping Her Party





Chyna then went out to eat with her kids while wearing a top covered in photos of her little ones.

The status of Rob and Chyna’s relationship remains unclear. They haven’t been spotted together since late April, and Rob did not appear to be present for Chyna’s birthday festivities last week.

For more from the couple, watch the clip below!
